Translations.Text: I do not serve what you serve
Nor do you serve what I serve
Nor will I serve what you serve
Nor will you serve what I serve
To you is your system, and to me is mine
When God's victory and conquest comes
And you see mankind entering into God's system in flocks
You shall glorify your Lord's grace, and seek His forgiveness. He is the Redeemer
Condemned is the hand of Abu-Lahab; condemned indeed
His money will not avail him, nor what he has earned
He will be sent to a flaming Fire
And his wife who carries the logs
On her neck will be a rope of thorns
